Directions: Read the passage below, then answer each question that follows.
Title: Source 1d. Hot Pack Investigation 4
Content: The student wants to test how the ratio between the mass of a hot pack and the mass of a water sample relates to temperature change. The student designs this procedure.

:box:1. Place a beaker with 50 mL of room-temperature water on top of a 300-g hot pack

2. Place a beaker with 100 mL of room-temperature water on top of a 600-g hot pack
The student realizes that he must redesign his procedure before conducting the test.
